amendment.description: At the end of the bill, before the short title, insert the following: \ TITLE V--ADDITIONAL GENERAL PROVISIONS \ SEC. 501. None of the funds made available by this Act shall be used to maintain more than 647,000,000 barrels of crude oil in the Strategic Petroleum Reserve.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to maintain more than 65 million barrels of oil in the Strategic Petroleum Reserve.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanders amendment (A014) as modified Failed by recorded vote: 152 - 267 (Roll no. 262).

action.text: Sanders amendment (A014) modified by unanimous consent. The modification strikes the figure "65 million" and inserts "647 million".
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Sanders.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Sanders amendment (A014) as modified Failed by recorded vote: 152 - 267 (Roll no. 262).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
